thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au | 4 of 79
thread.title: Iona

author: Iona
title: Iona
text: I bought a ticket for Nick Cave at the Sidney Myer Music Bowl, paid $175 for a general admission when other general admissions on the same page were $50 less. There were "lawn" tickets and seated tickets however the ticket I purchased had a seating number "G6" and so I thought I had bought a seated ticket. In fact it was just a lawn ticket, I paid almost 200% of the original $98 price. Quite disappointed TicketMaster.... And when I tried to call for help I was put in line with robot that kept asking me what tickets I wanted to purchase when all I wanted was to ask a question regarding a ticket.
